path_proj = here::here()

```{r}
fixed_q <- file.path(path_proj, "source", "models", "q-fixed.stan")
model <- cmdstan_model(fixed_q)
```

## Fully reported scenario

### Setting

```{r}
seed <- 123
set.seed(seed)

# data
alpha_increase_seq_1 <- seq(10, 750, by = 30)
alpha_decrease_seq_1 <- seq(750, 10, by = -30)
alpha_lamb =  c(rep(10,5), alpha_increase_seq_1 + rnorm(alpha_increase_seq_1,10,10),
                alpha_decrease_seq_1 + rnorm(alpha_decrease_seq_1,10,10),
                rep(10,5))
beta_lamb = 0.5
N_obs = 60
D <- 15;
```

### Simulation

```{r}
params_fixed_q_FR <- list(
  data = list(
    alpha_lamb = alpha_lamb,
    beta_lamb  = beta_lamb,
    N_obs       = N_obs,
    date_start = as.Date("2024-01-01"),
    D = D
  ),
  q_model = list(
    method        = "fixed_q",
    method_params = list(q_D = 100, b = 0.7, phi = 0.9)
  )
)

fixed_q_FR <- simulateData(params_fixed_q_FR)
plot(fixed_q_FR$qd, col = "red", pch = 19, type = "b", ylim = c(0,1))
```

### Exploratory analysis

```{r}
page_num <- ceiling(nrow(fixed_q_FR$case_reported_cumulated)/16)
exp_plot_fixed_q <- fit_exp_plot(fixed_q_FR$case_reported_cumulated,ncol = 4, nrow = 4, page = c(1:page_num), if_fit = T)
print(exp_plot_fixed_q)

exp_plot_fixed_q$coefficients
exp_b_data_fixed_q<- data.frame( date = as.Date(rownames(fixed_q_FR$case_reported_cumulated)),
                          b = exp_plot_fixed_q$coefficients$b)
exp_b_plot_fixed_q <- ggplot(exp_b_data_fixed_q, aes(x = date, y = b)) +
  geom_point(color = "black", size = 1.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se = TRUE,
              color = "blue", fill = "grey", alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Y", title = "Smoothed Curve of parameter b")
print(exp_b_plot_fixed_q)
```

### Model fitting

```{r}
ind = 40
stan_data <- list(T = ind, D = 15, Y = fixed_q_FR$case_reported_cumulated[1:ind, ])

test = model$sample(
    data = stan_data,
    iter_sampling = 3000,
    iter_warmup = 1000,
    chains = 1,
    refresh = 0,
    thin = 1)
varnames <- test$summary()$variable

param_true = tibble(
    parameter = grep("^lambda\\[.+\\]$", varnames, value = TRUE),
    x = fixed_q_FR$lambda_t[1:ind]
)
mcmc_areas(test$draws("lambda"), prob_outer = 0.95) +
    geom_point(aes(x = x), param_true, color = "red", size = 1)

param_true = tibble(
    parameter = grep("^p\\[.+\\]$", varnames, value = TRUE),
    x = c(fixed_q_FR$qd[1], diff(fixed_q_FR$qd))
)
mcmc_areas(test$draws("p"), prob_outer = 0.95) +
    geom_point(aes(x = x), param_true, color = "red", size = 1)

param_true = tibble(
    parameter = grep("^q\\[.+\\]$", varnames, value = TRUE),
    x = fixed_q_FR$qd
)
mcmc_areas(test$draws("q"), prob_outer = 0.95) +
    geom_point(aes(x = x), param_true, color = "red", size = 1)

param_true = tibble(
    parameter = grep("^N\\[.+\\]$", varnames, value = TRUE),
    x = fixed_q_FR$case_true[1:ind, 1]
)
mcmc_areas(test$draws("N"), prob_outer = 0.95) +
    geom_point(aes(x = x), param_true, color = "red", size = 1)
```

## Non-fully reported scenario

### Simulation

```{r}
# fixed_q_NFR
params_fixed_q_NFR <- list(
  data = list(
    alpha_lamb = alpha_lamb,
    beta_lamb  = beta_lamb,
    N_obs       = N_obs,
    date_start = as.Date("2024-01-01"),
    D = D
  ),
  q_model = list(
    method        = "fixed_q",
    method_params = list(q_D = 100, b = 0.15, phi = 0.9)
  )
)
fixed_q_NFR <- simulateData(params_fixed_q_NFR)
plot(fixed_q_NFR$qd, col = "red", pch = 19, type = "b", ylim = c(0,1))
```

### Exploratory analysis

```{r}
# exploritary analysis
page_num <- ceiling(nrow(fixed_q_NFR$case_reported_cumulated)/16)
exp_plot_fixed_q <- fit_exp_plot(fixed_q_NFR$case_reported_cumulated,ncol = 4, nrow = 4, page = c(1:page_num), if_fit = T)
print(exp_plot_fixed_q)

exp_plot_fixed_q$coefficients
exp_b_data_fixed_q<- data.frame( date = as.Date(rownames(fixed_q_NFR$case_reported_cumulated)),
                          b = exp_plot_fixed_q$coefficients$b)

exp_b_plot_fixed_q <- ggplot(exp_b_data_fixed_q, aes(x = date, y = b)) +
  geom_point(color = "black", size = 1.5) +
  geom_smooth(method = "loess", se = TRUE,
              color = "blue", fill = "grey", alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Y", title = "Smoothed Curve of parameter b")
print(exp_b_plot_fixed_q)
```
